name: Waypoint
headline: Finally, an email API with a powerful template builder.
description:
The fastest way to build and send data-rich transactional emails.

Alternative to SendGrid, MailGun, Mandrill, or Postmark.

founders.name: Jordan Isip, Founder
founders.description: Product designer with over 15 years of experience helping grow and develop new products within large organizations and small startups.

founders.name: Carlos Rodriguez-Rosario, Founder
founders.description: Puerto Rican, now living in Portland, OR. Interested in payments, taxes compliance, infrastructure as a service, messaging tools.

generated_description:
**Waypoint: The Game-Changer in Email API Services**

Waypoint started with a clear mission: to create a powerful email API paired with a user-friendly template builder. If you've ever found yourself in a cycle of endless revisions and slowdowns when sending data-rich transactional emails, this might just be the solution you've been waiting for. 

Think of Waypoint as an alternative to heavyweights like SendGrid, MailGun, Mandrill, or Postmark. The beauty of Waypoint lies in its focus on enabling teams to collaborate seamlessly—designers can create beautiful templates without constantly going back to developers, who can then send data with ease. Everyone has their role, and the resulting email experience is streamlined, fast, and effective.

**Key Features:**
- **User-Friendly Template Builder:** No coding necessary. Create visually appealing templates with personalization options, conditionals, and loops.
- **High Deliverability:** Your emails are sent via a robust AWS infrastructure, which means you land in inboxes—not spam folders.
- **Real-Time Analytics:** Monitor deliverability metrics, track opens and clicks, and have access to end-to-end email logs.
- **Collaborative Approach:** Designers and developers can work in tandem, improving the overall quality of the product emails.

Founded as part of Y Combinator's Winter 2021 batch, Waypoint is focused exclusively on transactional emails. The founders, Jordan and Carlos, created this tool out of a shared frustration with existing solutions, and their commitment shines through.

While Waypoint currently lacks some specifics (like the number of employees or their exact location), it’s clear that the company is positioned well for growth. Backed by a solid group of partners, Waypoint categorizes itself as a SaaS and B2B service focused on email design and APIs.

For those interested, you can dive deeper into their offerings at [Waypoint's website](https://www.usewaypoint.com). Whether you’re a developer tired of the email template ordeal or a designer wanting to take control of presentation, Waypoint could be exactly what you need.
